# Flex



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Default        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how 'justifyContent' aligns individual items along the main axis. | `'center' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'space-between' \| 'space-around' \| 'space-evenly' \| 'stretch' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'center' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'space-between' \| 'space-around' \| 'space-evenly' \| 'stretch'>` | `'stretch'`    |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                              | `'center' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'stretch' \| 'baseline' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'center' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'stretch' \| 'baseline'>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `'stretch'`    |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default 'row' defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                    | `'row' \| 'row-reverse' \| 'column' \| 'column-reverse' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'row' \| 'row-reverse' \| 'column' \| 'column-reverse'>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `'row'`        |
| `inline`         | `inline`          | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                              | `boolean \| BreakpointCustomizable<boolean>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `false`        |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                               | `'center' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'space-between' \| 'space-around' \| 'space-evenly' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'center' \| 'flex-start' \| 'flex-end' \| 'space-between' \| 'space-around' \| 'space-evenly'>`                                                                                            | `'flex-start'` |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                     | `'nowrap' \| 'wrap' \| 'wrap-reverse' \| BreakpointCustomizable<'nowrap' \| 'wrap' \| 'wrap-reverse'>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `'nowrap'`     |
